TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TextRunTypographyProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个抽象类以支持 对象的版式属性。

span.span: Provides an abstract class for supporting typography properties for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本布局客户端使用类生成的一组由 OpenType 布局引擎处理的功能。The text layout client uses the class to generate a set of features that are processed by the OpenType layout engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property AnnotationAlternates As Integer
public: abstract property int AnnotationAlternates { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取备用批注格式的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of an alternate annotation form.
The index of the alternate annotation form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注形式包括标志符号放置在打开或实心圆、 正方形、 括号、 菱形或圆角的框。Annotation forms include glyphs placed in open or solid circles, squares, parentheses, diamonds, or rounded boxes. 如果值大于 0 并且所选字体不支持批注替代项，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is greater than 0 and the selected font does not support annotation alternates, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Capitals As FontCapitals
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontCapitals Capitals { System::Windows::FontCapitals get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示所选字体大写格式的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the capital form of the selected font.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大写字母是一组以大写样式字形呈现文本的版式形式。Capitals are a set of typographical forms that render text in capital-styled glyphs. 通常情况下，当以全大写呈现文本时，字母之间的间距可能看起来很小，字母的权重和比例看起来会很大。Typically, when text is rendered as all capitals, the spacing between letters can appear too tight, and the weight and proportion of the letters too heavy. OpenType 大写字母，包括小型大写字母、 小号大写字母、 标题和大写字母间距支持大量的样式设置格式。OpenType supports a number of styling formats for capitals, including small capitals, petite capitals, titling, and capital spacing. 通过这些样式格式可控制大写字母的外观。These styling formats allow you to control the appearance of capitals. 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的标准大写字母，其后接样式为“SmallCaps”和“AllSmallCaps”的字母。The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps". 本例中，对所有三个单词均使用相同的字体大小。In this case, the same font size is used for all three words. ![使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母的文本")![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") 大写字母的示例Example of capitals

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CapitalSpacing As Boolean
public: abstract property bool CapitalSpacing { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否全局调整所有全大写文本的内部标志符号间距以提高可读性的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether inter-glyph spacing for all-capital text is globally adjusted to improve readability.

value.span: 如果调整间距，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if spacing is adjusted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大写字母间距功能让你可以在使用全大写字母文本时提供更宽的间距。Capital spacing is a feature that allows you to provide more spacing when using all capitals in text. 大写字母通常设计为与小写字母混合使用。Capital letters are typically designed to blend with lowercase letters. 大写字母和小写字母之间看起来比较美观的间距在使用全大写字母时可能会显得过紧。Spacing that appears attractive between and a capital letter and a lowercase letter may look too tight when all capital letters are used. 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的普通间距和大写字母间距。The following text displays normal and capital spacing for the Pescadero font. ![使用 OpenType 大写字母间距的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "使用 OpenType 大写字母间距的文本")![Text using OpenType capital spacing](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "Text using OpenType capital spacing") 普通字母和大写字母间距的示例Example of normal and capital spacing

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CaseSensitiveForms As Boolean
public: abstract property bool CaseSensitiveForms { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否调整标志符号的垂直位置以更好地与大写标志符号对齐的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether glyphs adjust their vertical position to better align with uppercase glyphs.

value.span: 如果调整垂直位置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the vertical position is adjusted; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContextualAlternates As Boolean
public: abstract property bool ContextualAlternates { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否可以根据所呈现文本的上下文使用自定义标志符号格式的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether custom glyph forms can be used based upon the context of the text being rendered.

value.span: 如果可以使用自定义标志符号格式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if custom glyph forms can be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 随机备用连接形式为单个字符提供多种备用字形。Random contextual alternates provide multiple substitute glyphs for a single character. 实现脚本类型字体时，此功能可通过使用一组随机选择的外观稍有差异的字形来模拟手写内容。When implemented with script-type fonts, this feature can simulate handwriting by using of a set of randomly chosen glyphs with slight differences in appearance. 以下文本使用 Lindsey 字体的随机备用连接形式。The following text uses random contextual alternates for the Lindsey font. 请注意字母“a”外观稍有变化Notice that the letter "a" varies slightly in appearance ![使用 OpenType 随机上下文替代项的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "使用 OpenType 随机上下文替代项的文本")![Text using OpenType random contextual alternates](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "Text using OpenType random contextual alternates") 随机上下文替代项的示例Example of random contextual alternates

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContextualLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool ContextualLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否启用上下文连字的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether contextual ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用上下文连字，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if contextual ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文连字旨在通过提供更好的联接构成连字的字符之间的行为来提高可读性。Contextual ligatures are designed to enhance readability by providing better joining behavior between the characters that make up the ligature. 如果值是`true`和选定的字体不支持上下文连字，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support contextual ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContextualSwashes As Integer
public: abstract property int ContextualSwashes { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取指定上下文花体格式的索引的值。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies the index of a contextual swashes form.
The index of the standard swashes form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 花体字形的某些组合可能导致文本外观欠佳，例如相邻字母的下行处出现重叠。Certain combinations of swash glyphs can cause an unattractive appearance, such as overlapping descenders on adjacent letters. 通过连接形式花体，可使用能生成更佳外观的替代花体字形。Using a contextual swash allows you to use a substitute swash glyph that produces a better appearance. 以下文本显示同一单词应用连接形式花体前后的外观。The following text shows the same word before and after a contextual swash is applied. ![使用 OpenType 上下文花体的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "使用 OpenType 上下文花体的文本")![Text using OpenType contextual swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "Text using OpenType contextual swashes") 上下文花体的示例Example of a contextual swash

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DiscretionaryLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool DiscretionaryLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否启用自由连字的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether discretionary ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用自由连字，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if discretionary ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自由连字旨在装饰并不是专门设计的可读性。Discretionary ligatures are designed to be ornamental and are not specifically designed for readability. 以下文本显示 Pericles 字体的自由连字字形。The following text displays discretionary ligature glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 自由连字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont05.gif "使用 OpenType 自由连字的文本")![Text using OpenType discretionary ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont05.gif "Text using OpenType discretionary ligatures") 自由连字集的示例Example of discretionary set of ligatures

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EastAsianExpertForms As Boolean
public: abstract property bool EastAsianExpertForms { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否已使用相应的首选版式格式替换标准日语字体格式的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the standard Japanese font forms have been replaced with the corresponding preferred typographic forms.

value.span: 如果使用相应的首选版式格式替换标准日语字体格式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if standard Japanese font forms have been replaced with the corresponding preferred typographic forms; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EastAsianLanguage As FontEastAsianLanguage
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontEastAsianLanguage EastAsianLanguage { System::Windows::FontEastAsianLanguage get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示要用于特定书写系统或语言的标志符号版本的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the version of glyphs to be used for a specific writing system or language.
One of the values.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EastAsianWidths As FontEastAsianWidths
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontEastAsianWidths EastAsianWidths { System::Windows::FontEastAsianWidths get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示要用于东亚字体中拉丁语字符的比例宽度的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the proportional width to be used for Latin characters in an East Asian font.
One of the values.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Fraction As FontFraction
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontFraction Fraction { System::Windows::FontFraction get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示分数样式的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the fraction style.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字体支持分数，包括前面带有斜线和堆积样式。OpenType fonts support styles for fractions, including slashed and stacked. 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的分数样式。The following text displays fraction styles for the Palatino Linotype font. ![文本使用 OpenType 横式分数和竖式](~/add/media/opentypefont12.gif "文本使用 OpenType 横式分数和竖式")![Text using OpenType slashed and stacked fractions](~/add/media/opentypefont12.gif "Text using OpenType slashed and stacked fractions") 前面带有斜线和堆积分数样式的示例Example of slashed and stacked fraction styles

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property HistoricalForms As Boolean
public: abstract property bool HistoricalForms { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否启用历史记录格式的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether historical forms are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用历史记录格式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if historical forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 历史形式指过去常见的版式约定。Historical forms are typographic conventions that were common in the past. 下面的文本显示短语"波士顿，麻省"的使用字体使用的标志符号的历史窗体。The following text displays the phrase "Boston, Massachusetts" using an historical form of glyphs for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 历史形式的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "使用 OpenType 历史形式的文本")![Text using OpenType historical forms](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "Text using OpenType historical forms") 历史形式的示例Example of historical forms

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property HistoricalLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool HistoricalLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否启用历史记录连字的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether historical ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用历史记录连字，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if historical ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 历史连字是采用字体设计器可能会添加到其字体的历史版式的排字窗体。Historical ligatures are typographic forms used in historical typography that font designers may add to their fonts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Kerning As Boolean
public: abstract property bool Kerning { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否启用字距调整的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether kerning is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用字距调整，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if kerning is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字距调整是调整字符用于改善单词形状之间的间距的排字函数。Kerning is a typographic function that adjusts the spacing between characters to enhance word shape.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MathematicalGreek As Boolean
public: abstract property bool MathematicalGreek { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否已使用在数学符号中常用的相应字体格式替换希腊语标志符号的标准版式字体格式的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether standard typographic font forms of Greek glyphs have been replaced with corresponding font forms commonly used in mathematical notation.

value.span: 如果启用数学希腊语格式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if mathematical Greek forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值是`true`和选定的字体不支持数学希腊语窗体，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support mathematical Greek forms, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumeralAlignment As FontNumeralAlignment
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontNumeralAlignment NumeralAlignment { System::Windows::FontNumeralAlignment get(); };

summary.span: 获取使用数字时的宽度对齐方式。

span.span: Gets the alignment of widths when using numerals.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字体支持按比例和表格图功能，以使用数字时控制宽度的对齐方式。OpenType fonts support a proportional and tabular figure feature to control the alignment of widths when using numerals. 比例数字将每个数字视为具有不同的宽度—“1”窄于“5”。Proportional figures treat each numeral as having a different width—"1" is narrower than "5". 将表格数字将被视为相等宽度数字，以便它们垂直对齐，这会增加数字信息的可读性。Tabular figures are treated as equal-width numerals so that they align vertically, which increases the readability of numerical information. 以下文本使用 Miramonte 字体显示第一列中的两个表格式数字。The following text displays two proportional figures in the first column using the Miramonte font. 请注意数字“5”和“1”之间的宽度差异。Note the difference in width between the numerals "5" and "1". 第二列显示相同的两个数值，并通过使用表格式数字功能调整其宽度。The second column shows the same two numeric values with the widths adjusted by using the tabular figure feature. ![使用 OpenType 比例和表格式数字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "使用 OpenType 比例和表格式数字的文本")![Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures") 比例和选项卡式数字示例Example of proportional and tabbed figures

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumeralStyle As FontNumeralStyle
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontNumeralStyle NumeralStyle { System::Windows::FontNumeralStyle get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示用于呈现数字备用字体格式的标志符号集的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the set of glyphs that are used to render numeric alternate font forms.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字体支持旧样式数字格式。OpenType fonts support an old-style numeral format. 此格式对于显示不再是标准样式的数字非常有用。This format is useful for displaying numerals in styles that are no longer standard. 下面的文本中使用字体的标准和旧样式数字格式显示 18 世纪日期。The following text displays an 18th-century date in standard and old-style numeral formats for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 旧样式数字文本](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "使用 OpenType 旧样式数字的文本")![Text using OpenType old style numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "Text using OpenType old style numerals") Standard 和旧样式数字示例Example of standard and old-style numerals 下面的文本显示标准数字使用字体，跟旧样式数字。The following text displays standard numerals for the Palatino Linotype font, followed by old-style numerals. ![使用 OpenType 旧样式数字集的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "使用 OpenType 旧样式数字集的文本")![Text using OpenType old style numeral sets](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "Text using OpenType old style numeral sets") Standard 和旧样式数字集示例Example of standard and old-style numeral sets

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnPropertiesChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 只要任何 属性的值发生更改，便会更正 派生类的内部状态。

span.span: Corrects internal state for a derived class whenever any property changes its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法从 set 访问器的属性重写时，如果值发生更改时 setter 的一部分。Call this method from set accessors of a property override, if the value changes as part of the setter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SlashedZero As Boolean
public: abstract property bool SlashedZero { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否将使用斜杠零替换标称零字体格式的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a nominal zero font form should be replaced with a slashed zero.

value.span: 如果启用斜杠零格式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if slashed zero forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字体支持前面带有斜线零数字格式以强调"O"的字母和数字"0"之间的差异。OpenType fonts support a slashed zero numeral format to emphasize the difference between the letter "O" and the numeral "0". 斜线零数字通常用于财务和商务信息中的标识符。The slashed zero numeral is often used for identifiers in financial and business information. 以下文本显示使用 Miramonte 字体的订单标识符。The following text displays a sample order identifier using the Miramonte font. 第一行使用标准数字。The first line uses standard numerals. 第二行使用斜线零数字，以便更易于与大写字母“O”进行区分。The second line used slashed zero numerals to provide better contrast with the uppercase "O" letter. ![文本使用 OpenType 斜线零数字](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "文本使用 OpenType 斜线零数字")![Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals") 斜线零数字的示例Example of slashed zero numerals 如果值是`true`和选定的字体不支持斜杠零格式，则显示的数字的默认格式。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support slashed zero forms, the default form of the numeral is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StandardLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool StandardLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否启用标准连字的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether standard ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了标准连字，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if standard ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下文本显示 Pericles 字体的标准连字字形。The following text displays standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 一组标准连字的示例Example of a standard set of ligatures 默认情况下中的 OpenType 字体[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]启用标准连字。By default, OpenType fonts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] enable standard ligatures. 例如，如果使用 Palatino Linotype 字体，则标准连字“fi”、“ff”和“fl”显示为组合字符字形。For example, if you use the Palatino Linotype font, the standard ligatures "fi", "ff", and "fl" appear as a combined character glyph. 请注意，每个标准连字的字符彼此相连。Notice that the characters of each standard ligature touch each other. ![使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "使用 OpenType 标准连字的文本")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 默认情况下启用的标准连字的示例Example of standard ligatures enabled by default 但是，可禁用标准连字功能，从而使“ff”等标准连字显示为两个单独的字形，而不显示为一个组合字符字形。However, you can disable standard ligature features so that a standard ligature such as "ff" displays as two separate glyphs, rather than as a combined character glyph. ![文本使用禁用的 OpenType 标准连字](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "文本使用禁用的 OpenType 标准连字")![Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures") 已禁用的标准连字的示例Example of disabled standard ligatures 如果值是`true`和选定的字体不支持标准连字，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support standard ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StandardSwashes As Integer
public: abstract property int StandardSwashes { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取标准花体格式的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of a standard swashes form.
The index of the standard swashes form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 花体是使用精美修饰的装饰性字形，通常与书法相关。Swashes are decorative glyphs that use elaborate ornamentation often associated with calligraphy. 以下文本显示 Pescadero 字体的标准和花体字形。The following text displays standard and swash glyphs for the Pescadero font. ![使用 OpenType 标准和花体标志符号的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "使用 OpenType 标准和花体标志符号的文本")![Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs") 标准和花体字形的示例Example of standard and swash glyphs 花体通常用作事件公告等简短文章中的修饰元素。Swashes are often used as decorative elements in short phrases such as event announcements. 以下文本使用花体强调事件名称的大写字母。The following text uses swashes to emphasize the capital letters of the name of the event. ![使用 OpenType 花体的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "使用 OpenType 花体的文本")![Text using OpenType swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "Text using OpenType swashes") 用于大写字母形式花体的示例Example of swashes used for capital letters 如果值大于 0 并且所选字体不支持在给定的索引值的标准连接形式花体窗体，则显示的字母的默认格式。If the value of is greater than 0 and the selected font does not support standard swashes forms at the given index value, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StylisticAlternates As Integer
public: abstract property int StylisticAlternates { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取样式备用项格式的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of a stylistic alternates form.

value.span: 样式备用项格式的索引。

span.span: The index of the stylistic alternates form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 备用项是可替代标准字形的字形。Alternates are glyphs that can be substituted for a standard glyph. OpenType 字体，如以下示例中，使用的 Pericles 字体包含可用于创建不同的外观，文本的备用标志符号。OpenType fonts, such as the Pericles font used in the following examples, contain alternate glyphs that you can use to create different appearances for text. 以下文本显示 Pericles 字体的标准字形。The following text displays standard glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 标准标志符号的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "使用 OpenType 标准标志符号的文本")![Text using OpenType standard glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "Text using OpenType standard glyphs") 一组标准的标志符号的示例Example of a standard set of glyphs Pericles OpenType 字体包含其他标志符号提供到一组标准的标志符号的样式替代项。The Pericles OpenType font contains additional glyphs that provide stylistic alternates to the standard set of glyphs. 以下文本显示样式备用字形。The following text displays stylistic alternate glyphs. ![使用 OpenType 样式备用标志符号的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "使用 OpenType 样式备用标志符号的文本")![Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs") 样式备用标志符号的示例Example of stylistic alternate glyphs 下面的文本显示多个样式备用标志符号 Pericles 字体。The following text displays several stylistic alternate glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 样式备用标志符号的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont03.gif "使用 OpenType 样式备用标志符号的文本")![Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont03.gif "Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs") 其他样式备用标志符号的示例Example of other stylistic alternate glyphs

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StylisticSet1 As Boolean
public: abstract property bool StylisticSet1 { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示是否启用字体格式的样式集的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a stylistic set of a font form is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用字体格式的样式集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the stylistic set of the font form is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些字体包含样式 variant 的标志符号对应字符集的部分。Some fonts contain stylistic variant glyphs that correspond to portions of a character set. 在样式集的标志符号可能用于协调视觉效果、 以特定方式进行交互或采用其他方式协同工作。Glyphs in stylistic sets may be designed to harmonize visually, interact in particular ways, or work together in other ways.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Variants As FontVariants
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontVariants Variants { System::Windows::FontVariants get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示要使用的标准版式格式的变体的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates a variation of the standard typographic form to be used.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 变体都类似于上标或下标字体窗体。Variants are similar to superscript or subscript font forms. 很可能包含不同的标志符号集之间上标和序号窗体中，下标和下级格式之间或字体窗体。It is possible for a font form to contain differing glyph sets between superscript and the ordinal form, or between subscript and inferior forms. 属性允许您为 OpenType 字体设置上标和下标的值。The property allows you to set superscript and subscript values for an OpenType font. 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的上标。The following text displays superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 上标的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "使用 OpenType 上标的文本")![Text using OpenType superscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "Text using OpenType superscripts") 上标的示例Example of superscripts 以下文本显示 Palatino Linotype 字体的下标。The following text displays subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 下标的文本](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "使用 OpenType 下标的文本")![Text using OpenType subscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "Text using OpenType subscripts") 下标的示例Example of subscripts 不支持变体的字体可能具有字体窗体的算法近似值。Fonts that do not support variants may have an algorithmic approximation of the font form.
